raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice that in baseball their isn't much diversity between the players. 
What do you wonder?
Why their isn't many coaches of color? Mainly in a national football league the head coaches color are the lowest with 13%. 
 
What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts my community because we don't really see diverse leadership. 
What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
In the graph it shows sports that don't have much diversity either with skin color or ethnicity. There's really not much diverse leadership going on. Headline: Sports With Not Much Diversity In 2021.
ace_sentences: I notice that baseball players have little diversity.
I wonder why there are few coaches of color.
In the National Football League, the percentage of head coaches of color is 13 percent.
In my community, we do not see much diverse leadership.
The graph shows sports that have little diversity in skin color.
The graph shows sports that have little diversity in ethnicity.
The graph shows that there is little diverse leadership in sports.
The headline is: Sports with not much diversity in 2021.
